cheatsheet.title: Create a time column correlation analysiss

intro.description: This type of analysis analyzes correlation between nominal and date columns and gives the result in a gantt chart that illustrates the start and finish dates of each variable.

item.title: Set the analysis metadata
item.description: This step opens the Create New Analysis wizard. You can right click on the "Analysis" folder or on a nomnal or a date column (or click the link below). This wizard helps you to fill the analysis metadata (name, purpose, description....). At the end it opens the corresponding editor in which you can define the settings of the analysis.

item.title: Select columns to analysis
item.description: Click the "Analyzed Columns" hyperlink (or click the link below). Then click "Select columns to analyze" to open a dialog box where you can select the nominal and date columns to analyze.

item.title: Select the right data mining type
Analyze
item.description: To execute the analysis, click on the "Run" button at the bottom of the editor (or click the link below). You can run the analysis with a context menu on the "Analysis" object in the "DQ Repository" view.
